tool.name: Make.biom
tool.description: Make biom files from a shared file

param.name: constaxonomy
param.label: contaxonomy - consensus taxonomy
param.help: The contaxonomy file is the taxonomy file outputted by classify.otu

param.name: metadata
param.label: metadata
param.help: You can add sample data support here

param.name: picrust
param.label: picrust
param.help: The picrust program requires green genes OTU IDs. The picrust parameter allows you to provide the OTU ID mapping table associated with your reference taxonomy

param.name: reftax
param.label: reftaxonomy
param.help: The referencetax parameter is used with the picrust parameter. Picrust requires the greengenes OTU IDs to be in the biom file, and the referencetax parameter allows you to provide your reference taxonomy file you used when classifying your sequences

param.name: groups
param.label: groups - Groups to include
param.help: By default all are included if no selection is made

param.name: label
param.label: label - Select OTU Labels to include
param.help: By default all are included if no selection is made

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documentation**
The make.biom command converts a shared_ shared file to biom_ files. The output can be filtered by groups and labels.
.. _shared: https://www.mothur.org/wiki/Shared_file .. _biom: http://biom-format.org/documentation/biom_format.html .. _make.biom: https://www.mothur.org/wiki/Make.biom
